category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA84_mapping_date_format
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to set the format used in attribute mapping when converting a Teamcenter attribute of type "Date" to an AutoCAD attribute (always string typed). The supported syntax is the same as for C function strftime specification (for additional details refer to http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/fe06s4ak(v=vs.71).aspx). For example, setting the format as "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M" will generate dates like "2012-02-20 12:51". If the preference is not defined or its value is empty date attributes will be converted using Teamcenter internal default format "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss(+/-)zz:zz".
